segments.text: I'm observing a kitchen scene filled with unnoticed dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still gushing from the sink, spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A huge puddle is forming, making the floor incredibly slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, oblivious, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, two children are engaged in a risky cookie operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is precariously balanced on a wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really can't believe no one is paying attention to these things.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for someone to fall and get seriously hurt is very high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to watch all these accidents waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are going to be ruined by the water, and possibly the floor too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a chaotic mess, all unfolding in slow motion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could just reach in and turn off that faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR
